      • getCriticalAge

        public int getCriticalAge()
        Checks for the age of the person and calculates the age until adulthood or retirement.
        Returns:
        Integer, if the person is young -> The years until adulthood, if the person is between adulthood and retirent age -> The years until retirement age, else The years retired.

      • areYou

        public boolean areYou​(int age)
        This method returns true if the age of the user is the same as the one provided.
        Parameters:
        age - The age to compare with.
        Returns:
        True if it's the same age. Otherwise returns false.

      • areYou

        public boolean areYou​(java.lang.String name)
        This method returns true if the name of the user is the same as the one provided.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to compare with.
        Returns:
        True if it's the same name. Otherwise returns false.

      • areYou

        public boolean areYou​(Person person)
        This method returns true if the person of the user is the same as the one provided.
        Parameters:
        person - The person to compare with.
        Returns:
        True if it's the same person. Otherwise returns false.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Person person)
        Compares the age of a given person to the person itself.
        Parameters:
        person - The person to compare the age with.
        Returns:
        0 if the ages are the same, -1 if the host person is younger, 1 if the host person is older.
